title: Live Updates: Netanyahu’s Arrest Sought by International Criminal Court
content: The I.C.C. rejected Israel’s challenges to its jurisdiction and also issued a warrant for a top Hamas official. Its chief prosecutor is seeking the arrests for war crimes in Israel and Gaza.

title: Abused Workers in India’s Sugar Industry Face Worse Fates if They Quit

title: Spain Looks to Grant Residency to Nearly 1 Million Migrants
